message: Hello Bob, thank you for your interest in my product. I believe it holds immense value, and after careful consideration, I'm offering it to you for $2,000,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional returns.
Alice, your offer is too high for me. I'm very interested in this product, but my budget is $1,200,000.  I'm willing to pay that amount today.  Let's see if we can work something out.

Bob, I appreciate your honesty about your budget and your willingness to negotiate.  I've done some calculations, and I can offer you the product for $1,750,000. This is a significant price reduction, reflecting my desire to make this deal work.

Alice, I appreciate the reduction, but $1,750,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm  very serious about buying this product, but my firm limit is $1,400,000.  If we can't come to an agreement at that price, I'll have to explore other options.
